about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi! My name is Natty (נתי). I love games, stories, and programming, so I decided to do a project that combines them all together.
about.p1b: This is a side project that I built myself and with the help of artificial intelligence. The goal of the project was to see what artificial intelligence can do in developing and creating gaming and entertainment experiences.
about.p1c: The project is an interesting solution to a problem that game developers all over the world have been dreaming about for years: a fully automated experience, not predetermined, a dynamic game (like D&D) - but automatic, independent, and unique every time. The experience that will respond appropriately to the behavior of the player, no matter who, and will always respond in context. This is where the AI ​​element comes in. It is a tool that will undoubtedly grow and take root in almost every area of ​​our lives in the future and I am happy to try it out in the world of games.
about.p2: If you enjoyed the game and would like to get in touch, I am available in several ways:

how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: AI Murder Mystery is an interactive detective experience powered by advanced AI models. Each game session generates a brand new, unique murder case for you to solve by interrogating suspects, collecting clues, and making your final accusation.
how.aiBackendDesc: The AI backend powers all scenario generation, suspect dialogue, and clue extraction for your game session.
how.scenarioGeneration: Scenario Generation: The AI creates a coherent scenario with a victim, suspects, motives, weapons, alibis, and relationships. Every detail is procedurally generated, so no two games are the same.
how.consistencyRules: Consistency Rules: The system enforces logical constraints (e.g., only one true murderer, plausible clues) to ensure a fair and solvable mystery.
how.interrogation: Interrogation: You select suspects to question. Each suspect is role-played by the AI, which remembers prior dialogue and adapts its responses.
how.clueExtraction: Clue Extraction: After each conversation, the AI analyzes the dialogue to extract meaningful clues, which are added to your clue log.
how.deductionAccusation: Deduction & Accusation: Review the clues, connect the dots, and submit your accusation when you think you've solved the case.
how.replayability: Replayability: If you guess wrong, you can generate a new scenario and try again. Every playthrough is different!
how.aiBackendUnified: Unified AI Backend: The game uses a single AI backend to generate scenarios, role-play suspects, and extract clues.
how.aiBackendReliable: Reliable Experience: The backend ensures a consistent and uninterrupted gameplay experience.
how.scenarioEngine: Scenario Engine: The backend builds and refines each case using scenario rules and normalization logic.
how.rolePlayingAI: Role-Playing AI: Each suspect is role-played by the AI, maintaining memory of your previous questions and their own alibis, motives, and secrets.
how.clueMining: Clue Mining: The AI extracts structured clues from free-form conversations, helping you keep track of important facts.
how.extensibleDesign: Extensible Design: The system is built to be extended—add new clue types, scoring logic, or even new AI providers by editing the backend modules.
how.techStackNode: Node.js + Express: Backend API for scenario generation, chat, and clue extraction.
how.techStackReact: TypeScript & React: Modern, responsive client UI (this app) built with Vite.
how.techStackAI: AI Backend: All scenario and dialogue logic is powered by a single AI backend.
how.extendingClueLogic: Add new clue extraction logic in src/clues.js.
how.extendingScenarioRules: Experiment with scenario rules in core/ and src/scenarioGenerator.js.
how.extendingAIProviders: Swap or add AI providers by editing src/ai.js.
how.extendingContribute: Contribute new features, UI improvements, or scenario types via pull requests!
how.enjoyExploring: Enjoy exploring, interrogating, and solving the mystery!

items.whatGame_a: This is a mystery game powered by AI... A murder has occurred, and you need to interrogate suspects and find out who the killer is.
items.howPlay_a: Read the scenario, question the suspects, collect clues, and try to deduce who is guilty.
items.canLose_a: No. If you accuse the wrong person, the game remains unsolved. You must keep interrogating suspects and deducing until you catch the killer.
items.sameStory_q: Is the story the same every time?
items.sameStory_a: No, each game generates a new scenario.
items.repeat_q: Can you play the same scenario again? Can you request a specific scenario?
items.glitch_a: That's normal. The AI isn't perfect and may make mistakes. Try gently 'correcting' it in the right direction. If nothing works, try restarting the game by refreshing the page.
items.whoMade_a: Me. Alone. Details are in the 'About Me' tab.
items.suggest_q: I have a suggestion... maybe some things could be improved...
items.suggest_a: Honestly, I'll be real with you, I'm not super keen on upgrading the project. If your suggestion requires too much effort, I'll probably ignore it. But if you really, really want to ask me something, go ahead—my details are in 'About Me'.
